Package rbvs.product

Interface IProduct

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDeepCopy
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompositeProduct, ExtendedProduct, Product, SimpleProduct
    public interface IProduct
extends IDeepCopy
    Specifies the behavior of an element that represents a product.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      IProduct deepCopy()
      Creates and returns a copy of this object.
      ProductCategory getCategory()
      Returns the ProductCategory of the IProduct.
      String getName()
      Returns the name of the IProduct.
      float getPrice()
      Returns the price of the IProduct.

      Sets the category of the product.
      void setName​(String name)
      Sets the name of the product.
      void setPrice​(float price)
      Sets the price of the product.
      boolean update​(IProduct product)
      Updates the properties of the IProduct with the properties of the passed IProduct.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns the name of the IProduct.
        Returns:
        the name

      • getPrice

        float getPrice()
        Returns the price of the IProduct.
        Returns:
        the price

      • getCategory

        ProductCategory getCategory()
        Returns the ProductCategory of the IProduct.
        Returns:
        the ProductCategory

      • setName

        void setName​(String name)
        Sets the name of the product. The passed name can be null or an empty string. If the passed name is null the name is initialized with an empty string.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the product

      • setCategory

        void setCategory​(ProductCategory category)
        Sets the category of the product. The passed category can be NULL, in this case the ProductCategory.DEFAULT value is used.
        Parameters:
        category - the category of the product

      • setPrice

        void setPrice​(float price)
       throws IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the price of the product. If a negative value is passed the method will throw an IllegalArgumentException. This Exception contains an error description consisting of a brief description of the cause and the illegal argument value.
        Parameters:
        price - the price of the product.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException

      • update

        boolean update​(IProduct product)
        Updates the properties of the IProduct with the properties of the passed IProduct. An update is only performed if the passed IProduct matches the current IProduct via the Object.equals(Object) method.
        Parameters:
        product - The IProduct that is used for the update.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the passed product matches and the properties have been updated. FALSE otherwise.

      • deepCopy

        IProduct deepCopy()
        Description copied from interface: IDeepCopy
        Creates and returns a copy of this object. The precise meaning of "copy" may depend on the class of the object. The general intent is that, for any object x, the expression: 
         x.deepCopy() != x
        will be true, and that the expression: 
         x.deepCopy().getClass() == x.getClass()
        will be true, but these are not absolute requirements. While it is typically the case that: 
         x.deepCopy().equals(x)
        will be true, this is not an absolute requirement.

        Specified by:
        deepCopy in interface IDeepCopy
        Returns:
        a clone of this object
